public class Hero
extends CharacterEvent

Placeholder class for the protagonist player.

Constructor Detail

Hero

public Hero(Level parent,
            CharacterEventMDO mdo,
            int x,
            int y)
Placeholder constructor. When the herp is finally initialized properly this will change. Right now it sets up the hero on the map like any other event. Also sets up the moveset called "default_moveset" though that should be put in the hero MDO when it gets created.

Parameters:
parent - The level the hero starts on
mdo - The character mdo dummy starting the hero
x - The x-coord (in pixels) to start hero at
y - The y-coord (in pixels) to start hero at

This default implementation moves us out of collision.

act

public void act(InputCommand command,
                Level map)
Passes the input command to the moveset for appropriate response. This handles special moves such as jumping and attacks, not the default movements. Those should be handled by the screen instead, at least until something better comes up.

Parameters:
command - The command to pass to the moveset
map - The map to perform an action on
